AssetId.Wiki: Specify the asset ID to generate. AEG999_999-> 999999

SlotNo.Wiki: This is the number for generation control. Only one asset can be generated in the same slot. You can control whether you want to generate duplicates or not.

CreateConditionType.Wiki: The type of condition of occurrence

TransitionSrcWeather.Wiki: Specify the transition source weather. It is referenced only when the occurrence condition is transition.

TransitionDstWeather.Wiki: Specify the transition destination weather. It is referenced only when the occurrence condition is transition.

ElapsedTimeCheckweather.Wiki: Specify the weather to check the elapsed time.

ElapsedTime.Wiki: Specify the elapsed time. It is referenced only when the occurrence condition is time elapsed. Real time Specify in seconds.

CreateDelayTime.Wiki: Specifies the time to delay after the generation is determined. The created slot will be in use while it is delayed. Created immediately with 0 or less.

CreateProbability.Wiki: Specifies the probability of occurrence when conditions for weather transitions or elapsed time are met.

LifeTime.Wiki: Specifies the life of the generated asset. Real time Specify in seconds.

FadeTime.Wiki: Time [seconds] used for fade-in and fade-out. No fade below 0.

EnableCreateTimeMin.Wiki: Specifies a start time that can be generated [0.0 --24.0]. If you put -1 in either the start or the end, it will be treated as unlimited (can be generated in all time).

EnableCreateTimeMax.Wiki: Specifies the end time that can be generated [0.0 --24.0]. If you put -1 in either the start or the end, it will be treated as unlimited (can be generated in all time).

CreatePoint0.Wiki: Specify the generation point number. Specify the last 3 digits of the Weather Asset Generation Point in MapStudio. -1 will be invalid

CreatePoint1.Wiki: Specify the generation point number. Specify the last 3 digits of the Weather Asset Generation Point in MapStudio. -1 will be invalid

CreatePoint2.Wiki: Specify the generation point number. Specify the last 3 digits of the Weather Asset Generation Point in MapStudio. -1 will be invalid

CreatePoint3.Wiki: Specify the generation point number. Specify the last 3 digits of the Weather Asset Generation Point in MapStudio. -1 will be invalid

CreateAssetLimitId0.Wiki: ID for production restriction. -1: Unlimited. Generation is allowed only if it matches the generation limit ID in Map default parameter .xlsm (SEQ08921).

CreateAssetLimitId1.Wiki: ID for production restriction. -1: Unlimited. Generation is allowed only if it matches the generation limit ID in Map default parameter .xlsm (SEQ08921).

CreateAssetLimitId2.Wiki: ID for production restriction. -1: Unlimited. Generation is allowed only if it matches the generation limit ID in Map default parameter .xlsm (SEQ08921).

CreateAssetLimitId3.Wiki: ID for production restriction. -1: Unlimited. Generation is allowed only if it matches the generation limit ID in Map default parameter .xlsm (SEQ08921).
